Reviews.Title: great bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: kbc
Reviews.Content: Pros: Value, Battery Life, Quality, PerformanceWell worth it for a touch screen laptop!!!! I could not have been happier. The battery can get me through a full day worth of use. I haven't had any touchscreen problems like other purchase laptops.This would serve probably the middle 90% of users. I have not had any problems running multiple programs, up to 10 internet tabs, etc.From a design standpoint it doesn't stack up against an ultra book, though the brushed look works for me. I prefer processing power and pricing over small size. I wan't more storage (1TB) rather than cloud storage with an SSD. Also probably slightly thicker since it comes with a cd/dvd drive. After comparing specs for months I could find anything with the specs of this laptop for the price.

Reviews.Title: Fits into brief case, fast computer
Reviews.Author: LaurenAhley7
Reviews.Content: Fast machine, great size for the traveler.  Having the disk drive makes it easy to upload or use old apps and files

Reviews.Title: Amazing Laptop! Great Performance!
Reviews.Author: Piyush
Reviews.Content: Writing this review from my new Dell. I am still getting used to Windows 8.1. The touchscreen and battery backup is pretty amazing. Touchpad behaves weird sometimes. This machine operates very silently like my other XPS machine which is pretty amazing for an Inspiron model. It lacks backlit keyboard but then I knew before purchasing this model and I can live with it. Its lightweight and portable.The aluminium finish looks cool. Overall, its a great laptop for its price and I'm happy with this purchase.Pros: Size, Fast, Touchscreen, Battery Backup, Silent Operation, No heating, Build Quality & aluminium finish and finally Price.Cons: Touchpad unstable sometimes, No backlit keyboard

Reviews.Title: Amazing Value, Incredible Customer Service, and a Solid Computer
Reviews.Author: Jinger Jarrett "Internet Marketer, Author, Wr...
Reviews.Content: I ordered this on Wednesday, and I received it on Thursday. It was everything I wanted in a computer, and I just couldn't believe the price. This is an excellent computer. I prefer square monitors over the long ones, and so I finally got the right monitor for me. It's touch screen, and you can zip through all your tasks with it. It's lightweight, runs fast, and is a great computer for all your needs.One more thing: the company that sold this to me processed my order immediately, shipped it fast, and I had it the next day. Excellent customer service. Some of the best I have seen. Highly, highly, recommended.

Reviews.Title: headline
Reviews.Author: Tino
Reviews.Content: Only thing this lacks is the backlit keyboard and the display resolution. Other than that, I highly recommend this laptop!!

Reviews.Title: great performance and size
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: great performance and size, it`s a small computer with a touch screen that allows mw to do my daily job

Reviews.Title: nice laptop
Reviews.Author: barun prasad
Reviews.Content: working good, and its has no disadvantage also with the amount its best one to buy,I am happy with this laptop

Reviews.Title: Loved the Book
Reviews.Author: Arfat
Reviews.Content: Dell Inspiron 14.1 - Inch Touch screen Ultra book (i14 RMT - 7501 s LV)Is amazing ... and very economical

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: I love this computer.  It is very fast, is the perfect size for moving it back and forth from school.  Plenty of memory for all kinds of music and pictures and documents.  Also the battery is great.  The major flaw to me is the sound.  I went from a beats audio laptop to this and its a major drop off.  Would be nice to have a black light keyboard also.  Overall would highly recommend this.  Would love for dell to comment back to the sound issue though.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Philip Palmiter
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived on time, and the item was in condition exactly as described. Works excellently and no detected. I'm sure I will get many more years of usage from the purchased item.

Intel Core i5-4200U Processor 1.6 GHz
8 GB DDR3L SDRAM
1 TB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
14.1-Inch Touch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 14.1-Inch Touchscreen Ultrabook (i14RMT-7501sLV)
